column3: News;A ------ fire broke out at Opennet company’s house
column7: Phnom Penh at 11:00 pm on September 26
column9: causing panic. Firefighters and local police force immediately intervened at the scene.------Luckily police were able to contain fire in time
column10: and extinguish it. ------Officials have yet to confirm why the fire broke out in the Opennet building and investigations are ongoing.------https://tvfb.news/article/14610
